code:
stateDiagram-v2
  [Education_ContentCDN] --> Initiator: app(Education_StudentDB)
  state Initiator {Education_ContentCDN] --> InterestsSent: send(Education_ClassroomService)
    InterestsSent --> RangeSent: recv(Education_ContentCDN)
    RangeSent --> RangeRecv: recv(Education_GradeSync)
    RangeRecv --> RangeSent: send(Education_GradeSync)
    RangeRecv --> [Education_ClassroomService]: app(Education_LMS_Portal)
  }
  [Education_LMS_Portal] --> Responder: app(Education_ContentCDN)
  state Responder {Education_ContentCDN] --> InterestsRecvd: recv(Education_StudentDB)
    InterestsRecvd --> RangeWait: send(Education_GradeSync)
    RangeWait --> RangeReply: recv(Education_GradeSync)
    RangeReply --> RangeWait: send(Education_StudentDB)
    RangeWait --> [Education_ContentCDN]: recv(Education_LMS_Portal)
  }
  Initiator --> SyncingValues
  Responder --> SyncingValues
  SynchingValues --> Synchronized: app(Education_GradeSync), send(Education_ClassroomService)
  Synchronized --> [Education_LMS_Portal]: recv(Education_ContentCDN)
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 让我们从头开始，先确定入口点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 明白了，Generic Diagram就这样设计。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 确认一下，Generic Diagram是正确的吧？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最后，流程到达Generic Diagram结束。
